summary:
Several texture tweaks to dwarven gear, to bring out more contrast.
Includes alternate helmet design.
descriptionHtml:
Dwarven gear felt a bit bland to me, both armor & weapons, so I edited some of the textures to bring out the details.
Also I didn\'t like how the helmet looked in 3rd person (especially from behind) so created a variant which is lore friendly (shaped like gears)
Most of the weapons were slightly tweaked, some were already fine and left untouched (e.g. shield & arrows looked fine)

[b]Install[/b]
Install using nexus mod manager.
• [i]Helmet replacer, Vanilla craftable[/i] - new helmet is default, original helmet can be crafted
• [i]Helmet Craftable only[/i] - new helmet is craftable only

[b]History[/b]
• [b]1.2, 29/9/2012[/b] - Enhanced Back armor pattern, fixed helmet proportions, vanilla helmet now points to right textures.
• [b]1.1, 16/9/2012[/b] - Fixed missing meshes/textures in NMM.
• [b]1.0, 16/9/2012[/b] - Initial release.

[b]Why no female version ?[/b]
Took me too long to make this mod, and also there\'s already a [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2696]nice female dwarven armor here.[/url]

[b]Can you make a helmet noface version ?[/b]
See above, also I actually play the game with helmet on 8 hotkey, and I use it to take it off around towns for immersion. :)
author: chai

files.name: Dwarven Gear Enhanced
files.changelogHtml:
Enhanced Back armor pattern.
Fixed helmet proportions.
Vanilla helmet now points to right textures.
